name: The Magical Item #7: Makana: The Mokis Casino
description: In Kazdora, Fiou guided Dino and his crew to the Mokis Casino, the seventh Magical Item. As soon as the crew enters the hall, the Moki twins, two genius monkeys, recognize Fiou, that turns out to be a mythical bird from the Island of Mermaids. They challenge Dino to the Moki Roll game: if Dino loses the game, he will have to hand over Fiou - if he wins, they will grant him and his crew access to the Island of Mermaids. Unlocking this portal will increase your Luck Attribute by 620 MPs.
